item.title: 菲律宾即将退出监督机构的黑钱 "灰名单
item.description: 菲律宾最早可能在下周从全球黑钱名单中除名，这对这个东南亚国家来说是一个潜在的推动力，因为该国正在推进改革，以打击洗钱和资助恐怖主义的风险。【原文：The Philippines may be removed from a global dirty-money list as early as next week, a potential boost to the Southeast Asian nation following a reform push to counter money laundering and terrorist-financing risks.】

item.title: 印尼股票基准跌至 2021 年以来最低水平
item.description: 印尼基准股票指数连续五天暴跌，使该指数跌至三年来的最低点，并逼近技术性熊市。【原文：A five-day slump in Indonesia’s benchmark stock index has left the gauge at a three-year low and approaching a technical bear market.】

item.title: 美菲军长讨论扩大联合演习规模
item.description: 面对与中国持续不断的紧张关系，美国和菲律宾的军事将领们讨论了如何扩大联合演习的 "范围和能力"。【原文：US and Philippine military generals discussed ways to increase the “scope and capacity” of their joint exercises in the face of lingering tensions with China.】

item.title: 经济学家预测，英国最贫困人口的境况将持续到 2027 年
item.description: 新的分析显示，英国最贫困家庭的生活水平要到 2027 年才能从通胀冲击中恢复过来，这凸显了工党政府在兑现让选民感觉生活更好的承诺方面所面临的困难。【原文：Living standards for Britain’s poorest households will take until 2027 to recover from the inflation shock, according to new analysis that underscores the difficulty facing the Labour government to meet its promise to make voters feel better off.】

item.title: 美国 1 月核心通胀率有望稳步上升
item.description: 根据经济学家的估计，上个月的通货膨胀可能依然顽固，这支持了美联储降低借贷成本的耐心态度。【原文：Inflation likely remained stubborn last month based on economists’ estimates, backing the Federal Reserve’s patient approach to lowering borrowing costs.】

item.title: 热带气旋 "泽利亚 "在澳大利亚主要铁矿石枢纽附近海域形成
item.description: 一个热带气旋已在西澳大利亚近海形成，预计将于周五横穿海岸，给该国主要的铁矿石出口中心带来暴雨和破坏性阵风。【原文：A tropical cyclone has formed off Western Australia and is expected to cross the coast on Friday, bringing heavy rain and damaging wind gusts to the nation’s major iron ore export hub.】

item.title: 新加坡散户交易员避开国内股市，转战热闹的美国市场
item.description: Kelvin Tan 于 2018 年开始在线投资，和许多新加坡人一样，他把所有资金都投入了本地股票。两年后，他完全转投美国股票。【原文：Kelvin Tan began investing online in 2018, and like many Singaporeans, put all of his money into local stocks. Two years later, he had switched entirely into US equities.】

item.title: 美国工业报告显示石油库存大幅增加，石油价格保持稳定
item.description: 一份行业报告显示，美国原油库存大幅增加，市场继续关注唐纳德-特朗普总统是否会在贸易问题上采取更多行动，此后石油市场趋于稳定。【原文：Oil steadied after an industry report indicated a large increase in US crude stockpiles, as the market continued to watch for more trade salvos from President Donald Trump.】

item.title: 特朗普顾问称澳大利亚正在 "扼杀 "美国铝市场
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普的一位高级贸易顾问说，澳大利亚正在 "扼杀 "美国铝市场，这对澳大利亚总理安东尼-阿尔巴尼塞争取免除下月生效的关税的努力是一个潜在的打击。【原文：Australia is “killing” the US aluminum market, a senior trade adviser to President Donald Trump said, in a potential blow to Prime Minister Anthony Albanese’s efforts to secure an exemption from tariffs that come into effect next month.】

item.title: 马斯克试图控制 OpenAI 使营利性转型变得复杂
item.description:
OpenAI的Altman回绝了马斯克的收购要约，但马斯克为非营利部门标出的价格可能会在重组讨论完成之前触及底线。【原文：

OpenAI's Altman has rebuffed the offer, but Musk's price tag for the nonprofit division creates a potential floor before restructuring discussions are completed.

】

item.title: 投资者追捧 "新星"，中国经济学家随股市反弹而反弹
item.description: 中国量化对冲基金在 2024 年最后一个季度强劲反弹，使该行业摆脱了因创纪录的缩水和监管钳制而遭受挫折的一年。【原文：Chinese quantitative hedge funds saw a strong rebound in the final quarter of 2024, saving the industry from an otherwise bruising year marked by record drawdowns and regulatory clampdown.】

item.title: 亚洲股市上涨，美联储的耐心导致债券下跌：市场综述
item.description: 在美联储主席杰罗姆-鲍威尔（Jerome Powell）发出耐心等待进一步降息的信号后，亚洲股市周三将上扬，而债券收益率则攀升。【原文：Asian stocks were set to advance on Wednesday, while bond yields climbed after Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell signaled patience before cutting interest rates further.】

item.title: 鲍威尔誓言削减美联储手册中的语言，以消除对银行业务的担忧
item.description: 美联储主席杰罗姆-鲍威尔（Jerome Powell）周二承诺删除美联储手册中的措辞，该手册要求储备银行官员在考虑支付系统账户申请时，注意金融机构领导层是否有 "有争议的评论或活动"。【原文：Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell on Tuesday pledged to remove language in a Fed manual that tells reserve bank officials to watch for “controversial commentary or activities” by a financial institution’s leadership when considering an application for a payment system account.】

item.title: 中国房地产危机进入危险的新阶段
item.description:
随着当局被迫在内地展开首次救援，以及香港标志性开发商新世界的债券陷入困境，风险与日俱增。【原文：

Risks grow as authorities are forced into a first mainland rescue and iconic Hong Kong developer New World’s bonds sink into distress. 

】

item.title: Rhone 和 Chatterjee 委托高盛领导朗玛斯科技在美国的首次公开募股
item.description: 据知情人士透露，私募股权公司 Rhone 和 Chatterjee Group 已聘请以高盛集团为首的银行参与 Lummus Technology 在美国的首次公开募股。【原文：Private equity firm Rhone and the Chatterjee Group have hired banks led by Goldman Sachs Group Inc. for a US initial public offering of Lummus Technology, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 超微因长期预测和申报承诺而获利
item.description: 超级微电脑公司（Super Micro Computer Inc）在给出了积极的长期收入展望，并表示 "相信 "将在纳斯达克公司规定的截止日期前提交经审计的财务报告后，在延时交易中上涨。【原文：Super Micro Computer Inc. rose in extended trading after giving an aggressive long-term revenue outlook and saying it “believes” it will meet a Nasdaq Inc. deadline to file audited financial results.】

item.title: 大举押注美国收益率上升的交易员面临至关重要的 CPI 数据
item.description: 自上周的就业报告公布以来，交易员们一直在为美国收益率走高下注，他们的信念最快将在周三受到最新通胀数据的考验。【原文：Traders who have been piling into wagers for higher US yields ever since last week’s jobs report will see their convictions tested as soon as Wednesday with the latest inflation readings.】

item.title: Lyft 公布第一季度低迷的预订量和利润展望
item.description: Lyft 公司发布了令人失望的第一季度总预订量展望，而竞争对手优步科技公司（Uber Technologies Inc.【原文：Lyft Inc. issued a disappointing first-quarter gross bookings outlook, following a similarly muted forecast from rival Uber Technologies Inc. citing impact from the extreme winter weather and LA wildfires.】

item.title: 第四季度业绩超预期，DoorDash 发布强劲订单展望
item.description: 美国最大的食品外卖服务公司 DoorDash 公司发布的第一季度订单前景超出了华尔街的预期，这再次表明消费者的需求仍然具有弹性。【原文：DoorDash Inc., the largest food delivery service in the US, issued an outlook for orders in the first quarter that surpassed Wall Street’s expectations, serving as yet another sign that consumer demand remains resilient.】

item.title: 首席执行官离职后，英国石油公司巴西负责人将接管生物能源部门
item.description: 英国石油公司（BP Plc）在巴西的负责人将接任该公司糖和乙醇部门的最高负责人，接替决定离开该公司的一位高管。【原文：The head of BP Plc in Brazil will take over as the top boss of the company’s sugar and ethanol unit, replacing an executive that decided to leave the firm.】

item.title: 墨西哥机场首席执行官吹嘘 "真正激进 "的投资计划
item.description: 洛斯卡沃斯、巴亚尔塔港和墨西哥其他旅游胜地的机场运营商正在将其五年支出计划增加到 520 亿比索（约合 25 亿美元），比最初宣布的数额增加了 20% 以上。【原文：The operator of airports in Los Cabos, Puerto Vallarta and other Mexican tourist destinations is increasing its five-year spending plan to 52 billion pesos ($2.5 billion), a boost of more than 20% from its initial announcement.】

item.title: 苹果公司在地图应用程序上将墨西哥湾更名为美国湾
item.description: 根据美国总统唐纳德-特朗普在上任第一天签署的行政命令，苹果公司将在其地图应用程序中把墨西哥湾更名为美国湾。【原文：Apple Inc. is renaming the Gulf of Mexico to Gulf of America on its Maps app, following an executive order signed by US President Donald Trump on his first day in office.】

item.title: 阿根廷市场老将在 Milei 涨势中成立新经纪公司
item.description: 随着投资者在哈维尔-米莱伊政府的领导下不断涌入阿根廷的资产市场，公司高级管理人员 Walter Stoeppelwerth 和 Nicolas Chiesa 获得了阿根廷的经纪执照，并将于本月开始运营。【原文：Senior executives Walter Stoeppelwerth and Nicolas Chiesa obtained a brokerage license in Argentina and will kick off operations this month as investors keep flocking into the country’s assets under Javier Milei’s government.】

item.title: 美联储威廉姆斯称通胀率有望达到 2%，但需要时间
item.description: 纽约联邦储备银行行长约翰-威廉姆斯（John Williams）表示，他预计通胀将继续放缓，向央行2%的目标迈进，但他警告说，与政策相关的不确定性给经济前景蒙上了阴影。【原文：Federal Reserve Bank of New York President John Williams said he anticipates inflation will continue to slow toward the central bank’s 2% goal, but warned policy-related uncertainty clouds the economic outlook.】

item.title: 萨默斯认为存在 2021 年错误以来最大的通胀爆发风险
item.description: 四年前，美国前财政部长劳伦斯-萨默斯（Lawrence Summers）曾抨击美国财政和货币政策制定者过度刺激经济，导致一代人以来最大的通胀爆发风险。【原文：Four years after blasting US fiscal and monetary policymakers for excessive stimulus that risked the biggest inflation blowout in a generation, former Treasury Secretary Lawrence Summers warned there’s danger of another breakout in price pressures.】

item.title: 加密货币托管公司 BitGo 据称考虑最快今年上市
item.description: 据熟知内情的人士透露，BitGo 公司正在考虑首次公开募股，加入了众多加密货币公司的行列，期待监管机构为其计划提供更多支持。【原文：BitGo Inc. is considering an initial public offering, according to people familiar with the matter, joining a flood of crypto companies anticipating more support for their plans from regulators.】

item.title: 特斯拉解禁为期权交易商提供了对冲市场下跌的途径
item.description: 随着电动汽车制造商特斯拉公司（Tesla Inc.【原文：As a post-election rally in the shares of electric-vehicle maker Tesla Inc. rapidly unwinds, some market watchers are spotting a lucrative trading opportunity.】

item.title: 肯-格里芬向埃隆-马斯克表示 "感谢"，抨击特朗普关税政策
item.description: Citadel 公司创始人肯-格里芬（Ken Griffin）说，他很感谢埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）从公司抽出时间来削减政府开支，但他对唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）总统关于关税的言论提出了直言不讳的批评。【原文：Citadel founder Ken Griffin said he’s grateful that Elon Musk is taking time away from his companies to slash government spending but offered blunt criticisms of President Donald Trump’s rhetoric on tariffs.】

item.title: 施纳贝尔称欧洲央行减息无法解决欧洲的结构性问题
item.description: 欧洲中央银行执行董事会成员伊莎贝尔-施纳贝尔（Isabel Schnabel）表示，欧洲中央银行降低借贷成本无法解决该地区经济面临的结构性挑战。【原文：Reductions in borrowing costs by the European Central Bank can’t address the structural challenges facing the region’s economy, according to Executive Board member Isabel Schnabel.】

item.title: 美国证券交易委员会的皮尔斯表示，该机构希望采用新方法制定加密货币政策
item.description: 美国证券交易委员会委员海丝特-皮尔斯（Hester Peirce）表示，华尔街监管机构正在仔细审查其针对加密货币公司提起的诉讼案件，因为该机构正试图就数字资产监管问题确定新的基调。【原文：US Securities and Exchange Commissioner Hester Peirce says the Wall Street watchdog is taking a close look at cases it has brought against crypto firms as it tries to strike a new tone on regulating digital assets.】
